example.parse: (SBAR (WHADVP-3 (REL_ADV كم)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC أليماً)) (ADVP-MNR (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM مشهد) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاعتداء)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تعرض) (PP-CLR (PREP ل) (NP (NP (PRON_3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مساء) (NP (NOUN أمس))) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM المطران) (NOUN_PROP غريغوار) (NOUN_PROP حداد))
